mapper.insert: insert into FREEBOARD (FREEBOARD_NUM, Title, CONTENT, WRITER, CREDATE) values(free_seq.nextval ,#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select FREEBOARD_NUM, Title, CONTENT, WRITER, e.NAME NAME, CREDATE, f.COUNT from FREEBOARD f, EMPLOYEES e where e.EMPLOYEE_ID = f.WRITER and FREEBOARD_NUM = #{freeboardNum}
mapper.update: update FREEBOARD set COUNT=COUNT+1 where FREEBOARD_NUM=#{freeboardNum}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY FREEBOARD_NUM DESC) rnum, FREEBOARD_NUM, Title, CONTENT, WRITER, CREDATE, COUNT from FREEBOARD where title like '%'||#{title}||'%') WHERE rnum >= #{startPage} AND rnum <= #{endPage} ORDER BY FREEBOARD_NUM DESC
mapper.insert: insert into COMMENTS (COMMENTS_NUM, FREEBOARD_NUM, COMMENTS_WRITER, COMMENTS_CONTENT, COMMENTS_CREDATE) values(COMMENTS_SEQ.nextval , #{freeboardNum}, #{commentsWriter}, #{commentsContent}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from COMMENTS where FREEBOARD_NUM = #{FREEBOARD_NUM} order by COMMENTS_NUM
